# Garrison (Building)
## Overview
**Garrison**

**Create** 126 Goods, 32 Influence, 112 Labor, 1 Magic (5,820 gp)

**Rooms** 4 Armories, 2 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedrooms]], 4 [[Bunks (Room)|Bunks]], 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 1 [[Dojo (Room)|Dojo]], 1 [[Guard Post (Room)|Guard Post]], 1 [[Infirmary (Room)|Infirmary]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 2 [[Office (Room)|Offices]], 2 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]]

A large building to house armies, train guards, and recruit militias; it is larger and more versatile than a [[Barracks]].
